lines.text: I just wonder what they could be doing, staying in that storeroom all night long? You can bet they're not playing Mahjong!
Julie, what were you doing in there?
I suffered, and I screamed, and I cried. It was beautiful. They wouldn't stop. They did it until I thought I couldn't stand it anymore. Then, they did it some more. It was beautiful.
Oh, god, you're out of your mind!
You're probably right, I'm outta my mind! But, with satisfaction. You oughta try it some time.

Ashamed? You just can't stop being a hypocrite, can you? You didn't take a back seat while the action was going on! But, but now that the swinging's over, what, what do you want me to do, hold your hand? Hey, I'm not gonna sit around and listen to this! I'm gonna go to a Chinese reastaurant and just drown myself in a bowl of wonton soup!
Oh, it's good! It's good! It's good! It's good! It's good! It's good! It's good! It's good! It's good! It's good...
You're hooked, Julie. You can never leave us. Never!
How much can you stand, Julie? It's great, isn't it? Isn't it? Isn't it?
Oh, yes! Yes! It's great! Oh, it's great!
